title: @Riot - OMG THESE SUPER GALAXY SKINS
body:
These are just absolutely unreal. You have really outdone yourself this time (just based on splash art alone so far). Can't wait to see in-game models and abilities, but I'm sure they're just as great.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/05/53-pbe-update-taliyah.html#more

replies.body:
It seems like they forgot about the Gurren Lagann theme....

Wait, no, Chompers and Wolf look like Gunmen.
I have to say Lambs stars on her body kinda remind me of kill la kill.
Glad I am not the only one seeing that. Shyvana also has three stars, one on either hand and one on the chest like Lamb.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=kHEhqc9v,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-03T18:47:32.763+0000)
>
> I have to say Lambs stars on her body kinda remind me of kill la kill.

Well, its from Gainax... so... i guess that counts.
Technically its not from Gainax,its from Trigger,which is a studio that was created from former gainax employees.
So glad you like them! Who is your favorite? :3
Definitely Kindred but I'm wondering... will both Wolf and Lamb will be on the loading slice together? They are too far apart in the splash art so I'm wondering.

Wolf won't be in the crop.

http://imgur.com/Cy3HlQt

Aw :(

In the future you guys should be sure to put them closer together in splashes. They are both the champ, not just Lamb!
The community already refers the Kindred as "her" even though it's both of them. Wolf continues to draw the short end of the stick.

Uhm actually he is there,right there behind lamb,you can see one of his eyes next to lambs robot leg.

Though he is very hard to see

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=kHEhqc9v,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2016-05-03T23:16:10.660+0000)
>
> Wolf won't be in the crop.
> 
> http://imgur.com/Cy3HlQt

Represent Wolf :C
I love the Kindred and Fizz one. The Shyvana one is good but seems somewhat girly like a star guardian skin almost.
What made you decide to make one for Kindred? That one personally doesn't rub me very well. Doesn't feel very "Kindred" but who am I to say?
Definitely the Kindred one! So perty! :)
Nice to see the Super Galaxy Line continued. Does anyone remember what happened to the first champion with this skin? ^_^
There is a Rumble in my ranked game with me right now :)
Rumble. Got buffed. Then gutted. funfunfunfunfunfunfun
I will HAVE to get the Fizz skin.
Super Galaxy {{champion:203}} looks good! {{champion:105}} too! Wonder what {{champion:102}} will look like? (Wasn't up when I checked)
Still not up for me either. Can't wait to see her even though I don't play her.

I put that their just incase someone comments later when its up. I work real soon. And I work for 10 hours.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I'm still not sure whether you hunt bows, or are a bow which hunts.

I'm a monster hunter.

I use bows like this:
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/5/5a/MH4-Bow_Equipment_Render_001.png/revision/latest?cb=20140610184349

To hunt things like this:
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/a/a4/3rdGen-Jhen_Mohran_Render_001.png/revision/latest?cb=20150304075612

Size comparison video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WYCXnCm_TG8

Still not buying RP until they fix DynQ.

Nice skins doe. Would sell my kids for Kindred skin kappa don't have kids.
